General.Name: Midi Utama Indonesia Tbk
General.Description: PT Midi Utama Indonesia Tbk engages in the retail of consumer products in Indonesia. The company operates through Food, Fresh Food, and Non-Food segments. It offers its products through fruit store network under the Midi Fresh name; minimarket network under the Alfamidi name; convenience stores under the Lawson name; and supermarket network under the Alfamidi super name. The company was formerly known as PT Midimart Utama. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. As of December 31, 2022, PT Midi Utama Indonesia Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Sumber Alfaria Trijaya Tbk.
